pages.text: The Neomanila $(l)eXterminate/$ Advancements can be accessed via the [$(k:advancements)] key.$(br2)Every time you defeat most mobs for the first time, you will earn some coins:$(br2)V.Common mobs: 1 $(item)Bronze coin/$$(br)Common mobs: 50 $(item)Bronze coins/$$(br)Uncommon mobs: 1 $(item)Silver coin/$$(br)Rare mobs: 50 $(item)Silver coins/$$(br)Very rare mobs: 1 $(item)Gold coin/$

$(thing)Evokers/$ are pillagers that spawn during raids and on $(thing)Woodland Mansions/$ that drop $(item)Totem of Undying/$ trinket. This item, when equipped, saves you from death once.$(br2)Don't forget to right-click your coins while holding them in your hand. This will put them in the coin pouch in your inventory, which does $(l)not/$ drop when you die.
